attributes.action: ensure that medical and all allied health professionals on undergraduate programmes have fibromyalgia included on the curriculum so as to ensure improvements in awareness and early detection of this disorder in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fibromyalgia is a debilitating, long term, chronic pain condition. It's origins are unknown, however the evidence base suggests that early detection improves the chances of people maintaining and retaining their vocations and valued occupations and psychological well being

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
